author: Paul Steinhauser
title: Georgia GOP gubernatorial clash: Gov. Kemp and Trump-backed challenger Perdue to face off at debates

sentence: After a Perdue rally and $3 million spent by him and his allies since February throwing mud at Brian Kemp, the governor still holds a double-digit lead,? said Cody Hall, Kemp's campaign spokesman.
title: Kemp, Raffensperger lead Trump-backed challengers in Georgia: poll

author: Ashley Oliver
title: Georgia Poll: Brian Kemp Has Wide Lead over David Perdue in Governor's Primary

author: JEFF AMY Associated Press
title: Georgia's Kemp and Perdue clash over elections in debate

author: Associated Press
title: Sparks fly in Georgia GOP gubernatorial debate: Perdue adamant 2020 election was stolen

sentence: Incumbent GOP Governor Brian Kemp remains the clear frontrunner in the race, with a recent poll carried out from April 22 to 27 by SurveyUSA showing he had the backing of 56 percent of Republican voters.
author: Jason Lemon
title: GOP Governor Candidate Takes Aim at 'Luciferian Regime,' 'Satanic Elites'
Ohio Republicans campaign in Trump's shadow ahead of Tuesday's primary.

author: Paul Steinhauser
title: Georgia GOP gubernatorial clash: Kemp brings in big bucks as he faces Trump-backed challenge from Perdue
